tutorial.speak:
To import your existing videos, you can use the bulk import from YouTube or Vimeo option in the Settings sidebar. They both work the same way.
Before you can do so, you must first create a playlist for the videos to be added to.
If you wish you can create a single "sermons" playlist to contain all videos. In our case, we're going to make one for our Exodus sermon series. Give it a name, description and a 16 by 9 photo. Set a start date for the series so they appear in order and click save.
We're now ready to run the bulk import. Click the link for Youtube or Vimeo.
You will need to enter your channel I.D. to fetch videos. See the help link on this page for instructions on how to find it.
Click fetch and you will see a list of videos from your YouTube channel.
Select your Playlist and check the videos you wish to be a part of it and click Save. If you wish you can check the box for new videos uploaded to automatically be added in the future.
Those videos will be imported along with all their details such as date, run time, descriptions and thumbnails.
You can repeat the process with additional sermon series.
These sermon series
And their related videos will show up on the sermons page you create with the website builder.
